title: Dashlane is gone after firefox reset.
content:
I was asked to reset Firefox. It went through it's paces. I have now noticed Dashlane is no longer on my browser. When I tried to sign into Dashlane on line, it won't send me an email to my account. I am dead in the water. What happened to my dashlane account? How do I fix?

Jeff
creator: kanejeff83

title: Firefox update also installed Keeper password manager
content:
Updated to Firefox 124.0.1 on March 28 (from 123.0.1, which was installed on March 12). This update also installed the Keeper password manager addon.

This is a work PC so it's locked down by IT admin, including extensions on FF. I have no access to about:addons ("Blocked Page - Your organisation has blocked access to this page or web site") and it's impossible to install Xpis.

However, extracting info from extension.json shows that KeeperÂ® Password Manager & Digital Vault Version: 16.8.1 was installed at the time the update to FF 124.0.1 happened. See images.

How can this happen? What can be done to remove Keeper, given that I don't have access to about:addons?

Possibly relevant: I do have some extensions that I had installed before Firefox extension access and install was locked down by Admin (lock down of FF was done remotely through some kind of policy), including LastPass.

torata
creator: torata

title: Annoying address bar/search issue
content:
Until a few days ago, I could type a search into the Firefox home page and my typing would appear as expected in that 'window.' Now the typing appears in a address bar, apparently owned by google, at the top of the page and it is extremely distracting and annoying.

How can I restore the sensible and easy way to search?

I attach here a screenshot of the place where I would like to see my search
creator: bruce106

title: Allow certain extensions to run only in private windows
content: I want certain extensions to be able to run in private windows, but not in normal windows. For example, I would browse normally without a VPN extension, and when I open a private window, the VPN extension would be enabled.
creator: strongsand94191

title: Application Icon
content: How do I remove an application icon from the start page on my Mac Air?
